title: Fund Withdrawal Procedure
intro: Funds can be withdrawn at any time through the trading platform as long as funds are available and do not exceed the Effective Margin in the Statement Report.

steps.step1_desc: Log in to your real account on the trading platform, then select the Withdrawal menu.
steps.step2_desc: Complete the fund withdrawal application form with accurate information, including the withdrawal amount and destination bank account.
steps.step3_desc: Withdrawals can only be made to bank accounts under the Client's name as registered in the account opening documents.
steps.step4_desc: The operations team will verify fund availability, data accuracy, and your transaction status before processing the request.
steps.step5_desc: The withdrawal process takes a maximum of T+3 business days, with a commitment to faster processing at T+1 business days when possible.
steps.step6_desc: You will receive a notification once the funds have been successfully transferred to your account.
